description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              Number of recruits:  1
              
              Position: IOS developer
              

              We are Japanese IT company.
              
              In this recruitment, we are seeking developers who are in charge of new projects starting in Cambodia and Viet Nam from now.
              
              This project will be deployed service only in Cambodia and Vietnam at the beginning of service, but it will be the service that can be expanded worldwide.
              
              Therefore, We are recruiting talents who can have a sense of responsibility, think and make proposals for the project. Depending on technical capabilities, we are considering to entrust applicant to work as a team leader.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              Age: 20 - 30 years old.
              
              Working time: 8h00 – 17:00
              
              High priority for people who have the experience of development native iOS app, can work long term, have career passion, and not changing jobs so many times.
              

              + Required skill:
              
              Must have from over 2 experience years of ios app development by Swift
              
              Have experience of working for more than 3 projects and performance of 3 applications
              

              + Non-required skills/ advantage skills: (Advantage)
              
              Have experienced in implement of real time location sharing feature to iOS app
              
              Have experience of Android app development (Development language is not required - we focus on performance and current skills)
              
              Have experience of Front-end such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn
